translation.Step2Desc: Setup how you want to process your video.
translation.Step3Desc: Select the area in which you want to perform detection.
translation.DnDDesc: Drag 'n' drop video here, or click to browse files
translation.Name: Name
translation.ModelAccuracyInfo: Accuracy of detections which affects performance. Lower accuracy will increase processing speed.
translation.ObjectDetectionInfo: Object detection in the video (cannot be turned off).
translation.FaceRecognitionInfo: Try to recognize each person by his face (has a performance impact).
translation.ObjectTrackingInfo: Each detected object will be tracked (has a performance impact).
translation.DrawingTracksInfo: Draw a path behind each object.
translation.TrackLengthInfo: The length of the track in seconds, before it begins to disappear.
translation.DisplayCountersInfo: Display current and total number of detected objects on each frame.
translation.DisplayTimestampInfo: Display current timestamp in the video on each frame.
translation.RecognitionInfo: Upload at least 5 images of a person's face that is rotated 45 degrees.
translation.NameInputInfo: Must contain at least one character.
translation.FaceUploadError: Error occurred while uploading face image
